skillTree.name: Ancient Stegadon
skillTree.description: Mighty, horned, reptilian beasts, Stegadons are naturally armoured with bony scales and spikes protruding from their crests.

effects.description: Mount: Ancient Stegadon

skillTree.name: Agility of the Lizard
skillTree.description: Lizardmen can move with deceptive speed and agility when they have to.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10%

skillTree.name: Protection of the Old Ones
skillTree.description: Across the gulf of space, the serene Potec has shared the secrets of time so that the Lizardmen may protect themselves against supernatural attack.

effects.description: Spell resistance: 10%
Bound spell: "Urannon's Thunderbolt"

skillTree.name: Blessing of Tepok
skillTree.description: "Brother of Great Tlazcotl, Tepok of the Air shall always be honoured. Let it be done."

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +5% when increasing

Speed: +10%
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 5%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Unleash the Winds
skillTree.description: Those sensitive to the skeins of destiny can feel its precarious balance as well as sense Tetto’eko’s uncanny ability to shift the winds of fate his own way.

effects.description: Army Ability: "Unleash the Winds"

skillTree.name: Predicting the Future
skillTree.description: By Tetto’eko’s predictions, many dire events have been averted before they were allowed to happen. It was Tetto’eko and his precognitive skills that defeated the Skaven forces that massed once again at Quetza. It was Tetto’eko that pointed the great Chameleon Skink Oxyotl towards the hidden enclave of Skaven Assassins that was waiting to ambush Lord Mazdamundi.

effects.description:
Reinforcement range: +50%
	(Lord's army)
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +50%

Enemy Hero action success chance: -25%
	(enemy characters in region)

skillTree.name: Good Omens
skillTree.description: It has been said that the Lizardmen have never lost a battle with Tetto’eko present. So famous are Tetto’eko’s predictions that he is afforded the same reverence as a Slann - the Temple Guard bowing low as the Skink hovers across the city to attend to his many star-viewings.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +8 for melee infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Magic resistance: 10% for melee infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Attribute: Immune to Psychology
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Herald of Cosmic Events
skillTree.description: Tetto'eko's appearance on the battlefield heralds events of such importance that heavenly bodies have been known to realign themselves in his favour.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve: +10 per turn

Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve change: -15% when increasing
	(local region)
Passive ability: "Herald of Cosmic Events"

skillTree.name: Chief Astronomer
skillTree.description: At over a century old, Tetto’eko is ancient for a Skink, yet his mind is quick and his unprecedented ability to predict the future only seems to improve.

effects.description:
Unlocks Hero recruitment: Skink Priest
	(all provinces)

Hero recruit rank: +5 for Skink Priests
	(local province)

skillTree.name: Greatest Skink Priest
skillTree.description: The Skink Priest was spawned when the true moon obscured the cursed second moon; this was previously seen as an ill omen, but with the coming of Tetto’eko it has now been pronounced as a sign of good fortune.

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

effects.description: Miscast base chance: -15%

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5
Passive ability: "Arcane Conduit"

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)
Character's aura leadership effect: +5

skillTree.name: Proud Warrior
skillTree.description: A long-serving member of an ancient, honourable tradition.

skillTree.name: Skirmisher
skillTree.description: This seasoned warrior understands irregular combat perfectly: when to attack, when to hold back, when to withdraw behind heavier lines.

skillTree.name: Swift Rider
skillTree.description: Only the finest beast riders can hang on whilst their mounts crash through the jungle undergrowth or smash through the foe's ranks.

skillTree.name: Sacred Guardian
skillTree.description: It is a great honour to direct the elite warriors who protect the Plan from calamity.

skillTree.description: The most intelligent hunter tends to move swiftly up the chain of command.

skillTree.name: Beast Driver
skillTree.description: The largest, most aggressive creatures - usually the oldest bulls of the herd - must be directed, lest their independent spirit lead them astray.

skillTree.name: Jungle Dominion
skillTree.description: The unforgiving law of the jungle is most clear on matters of ascendancy.

Armour: +10 for Saurus and Temple Guards units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Saurus and Temple Guards units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 15% for Saurus and Temple Guards units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Spawn-Kin
skillTree.description: Braves who emerge from the same spawning often share a deep connection – a bond which provides considerable advantages in battle.

skillTree.name: Soul Bound
skillTree.description: Mount and rider, together as one at their very cores. Indivisible.

skillTree.name: Epicentrist
skillTree.description: You need to be at the very centre of this pack of furious monsters to have the minutest chance of controlling their rage. Good luck!

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +5%

skillTree.name: Iron Disciplinarian
skillTree.description: This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.

skillTree.description: The Lords rule, the peasants toil. Nothing has changed in over a thousand years.

skillTree.description: This warrior has been ambushed previously and got themselves and many of their compatriots away safely. Such things make one naturally suspicious.

backgroundSkills.name: Astromancer of the Constellations
backgroundSkills.description: Tetto'eko is the Chief Astronomer of the Temple of the Eclipse in Tlaxtlan and one of the greatest Skink Priests the Lizardmen have ever known.

items.description: Atop this staff is a mystical orrery with which Tetto’eko can alter the trajectory of passing comets.
